letters.description: Conduct a comprehensive assessment to determine the client's unique bio-energetic constitution and baseline state of health.
Analyze the current state of imbalance (Vikriti) and identify the presence of accumulated metabolic toxins (Ama).
Strengthen the digestive fire through targeted protocols to ensure effective nutrient assimilation and systemic detoxification.
Implement personalized dietary interventions and herbal support aligned with seasonal cycles and constitutional requirements.
Establish daily self-care rituals (Dinacharya) and spiritual practices to sustain long-term Ojas and holistic harmony.
